important.title: Important
important.1: We accept payments only in Tether (USDT).
important.2: Top up your balance to activate your subscription.
important.4: Sending any other coin or token to this address except USDT may result in loss of your funds.

5.first_part: To activate a subscription “{{ subscriptionName }}“ for {{ subscriptionTerm }}
5.second_part: {subscriptionTerm, plural, =1 {day} =2 {days} =3 {days} =4 {days} other {days}} you need to top up your balance for {{ subscriptionPrice }} USDT + add ~1 USDT to cover a network fee.
